variable.label: Short Address
variable.tooltip: CV1 sets the Short, Primary or 2-digit address [range 1-127]

variable.label: Start Voltage
variable.tooltip: CV2 sets the motor voltage at Speed Step 1 [range 0-32]

variable.label: Acceleration
variable.tooltip: CV3 sets the acceleration rate (delay) [range 0-32]

variable.label: Deceleration
variable.tooltip: CV4 sets the deceleration rate (delay) [range 0-32]

variable.label: Top Voltage
variable.tooltip: CV5 sets the motor voltage at the top Speed Step [range 0-32]

variable.label: Version ID
variable.tooltip: CV7 is the Decoder ID, Read Only

variable.label: Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: CV8 is the Manufacturer ID, MRC-143, Read Only

variable.label: Long Address
variable.tooltip: CVs17 and 18 set the Extended (4 digit) address, [range 128-9999]

variable.label: Advanced Consist Address
variable.tooltip: CV19 sets the Advanced Consist address, [range 0-127]

variable.label: Consist Function
variable.tooltip: CV21 selects the address accessory functions will respond to

variable.label: Normal Direction of Motion
variable.tooltip: CV29 [ '1' bit (LSB)] sets the direction of motion

variable.label: Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: CV29 ['2' bit] sets the Speed Step resolution

variable.label: Analog Conversion Mode
variable.tooltip: CV29 ['4' bit] determines if loco motor will respond to DCC only (OFF) or DC and DCC (ON)

variable.label: Use Speed Table
variable.tooltip: CV29 ['8' bit] determines if loco will use Speed Table or not

variable.label: Addressing Mode
variable.tooltip: CV29 ['32' bit] sets the Addressing Mode

variable.label: Sound On/Off
variable.tooltip: CV49 can turn off all sound

variable.label: Whistle Type
variable.tooltip: CV50 selects the Whistle Type [range 0-11]

variable.label: Whistle Volume
variable.tooltip: CV51 selects the Whistle Volume [range 0-3]

variable.label: Bell Type

variable.label: Bell Volume

variable.label: Bell Ring Rate

variable.label: Chuff Volume

variable.label: Brake Squeal Volume

variable.label: Random Noise Volume

variable.label: Injector Volume
